rotate_lens.description: Rotate the lens to adjust the focus.

clean_lens.description: Clean the lens to ensure clear picture quality.

press_button.description: Press the button to take a picture.

clean_button.description: Clean the button to ensure proper functionality.

slide_camera_slider.description: Slide the camera slider to adjust the picture modes.

clean_slider.description: Clean the slider to ensure smooth operation.

rotate_knob.description: Rotate the knob to fine-tune the camera settings.

clean_knob.description: Clean the knob to ensure smooth rotation.

clean_camera_body.description: Clean the camera body to maintain the aesthetic look of the camera.

clean_whole_camera.description: Clean the entire camera including the lens, button, slider, knob, and camera body.
